name: places/ChIJe3fHbx70wokRZeYIKk-DWIU
formattedAddress: 201 Wadsworth Ave #3, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 201 Wadsworth Ave #3, New York, NY 10033-3862, USA

originalText.text: Has absolutely no consideration for her patients time and never showed up during the 2-2.5 hours I waited along with several other patients. Her staff couldn’t make an excuses for her either. The nurse that saw me first was very nice though.

text.text: Has absolutely no consideration for her patients time and never showed up during the 2-2.5 hours I waited along with several other patients. Her staff couldn’t make an excuses for her either. The nurse that saw me first was very nice though.

originalText.text: If you value your health dont go to this doctor i had gone to this doctor because of severe back pain she sent me to get regular exrays of my back which only showed my bone structure when i went back to get the results she told me that there was nothing wrong with my back and to search for a pain management place where i would have to come out of pocket to get treated . A few months afterward i went to the hospital to get checked because of pain i was having with my kidneys which resulted in kidney stones they had taken an MRI to see what was going on and the first thing the doctor asked me was if i always had back pain and to my surprise i had a herniated disk in my back which would only be taken care of with surgery. Im not gonna lie yes the first time i went in she seemed very nice and professional but once i went to get my results in or once they had charged everything they could on my insurance all she said in a very cold manner was i dont give pain to patients who have nothing wrong with them . Not to mention that i came out of pocket for the exrays she send me to take . My biggest issue with this was that without doctors note i was forced to work for 3 months with sciatic pain for almost three months until the pain subsided . This lack of care for me as her new patient ended in my aggravating my injury even more . And just in case theres any doubt about what im saying i had the doctor at Jamaica hospital write down notes about my injury to my bosses which questioned my injury at the time it happen because of her lack of professionalism this was as easy as just sending me to get an MRI .

originalText.text: Worst service. If there was a 0 it would be that. It’s ridiculous. My dad had a virtual appointment they never called. My dad called to follow up and they said they were too busy to see him. We’ve been calling for 2 weeks and nothing. My dads condition has gotten worse now and they don’t pick up or direct way to reach the doctor. Had to change his doctor. Never coming back !!!

originalText.text: She has been my doctor for 8 years, I love it there, outstanding service, I really like the doctor because she is very nice & explains everything very well. I really like the new NP Melinda, she is very easy going & also explains everything good.

originalText.text: She has been my primary care doctor, she’s very professional, knowledgeable, well detail and makes her patients feel like family.
